abort.no_homes: There are no homes linked to this Tado account.

progress.wait_for_device:
To authenticate, open the following URL and login at Tado:
{url}
If the code is not automatically copied, paste the following code to authorize the integration:

```{code}```


The login attempt will time out after five minutes.

homekit.description: Your device has been discovered and needs to authenticate with Tado. Press `Submit` to start the authentication process.
homekit.title: Authenticate with Tado

reauth_confirm.description: You need to reauthenticate with Tado. Press `Submit` to start the authentication process.
reauth_confirm.title: Authenticate with Tado

timeout.description: The authentication process timed out. Please try again.

water_heater_fallback.description: Due to added support for water heaters entities, these entities may use a different overlay. Please configure the integration entity and Tado app water heater zone overlay options (under Settings -> Rooms & Devices -> Hot Water).
water_heater_fallback.title: Tado water heater entities now support fallback options

init.description: Fallback mode lets you choose when to fallback to Smart Schedule from your manual zone overlay. (NEXT_TIME_BLOCK:= Change at next Smart Schedule change; MANUAL:= Don't change until you cancel; TADO_DEFAULT:= Change based on your setting in the Tado app).
init.title: Adjust Tado options.

add_meter_reading.description: Adds a meter reading to Tado Energy IQ.

config_entry.description: Config entry to add meter reading to.
config_entry.name: Config entry

reading.description: Reading in mÂ³ or kWh without decimals.
reading.name: Reading

add_meter_reading.name: Add meter reading

set_climate_temperature_offset.description: Sets the temperature offset of climate entities.

offset.description: Offset you would like (depending on your device).
offset.name: Offset

set_climate_temperature_offset.name: Set climate temperature offset

set_climate_timer.description: Turns on climate entities for a set time.

requested_overlay.description: Choose this or 'Time period'. Allows you to choose an overlay. MANUAL:=Overlay until user removes; NEXT_TIME_BLOCK:=Overlay until next timeblock; TADO_DEFAULT:=Overlay based on Tado app setting.
requested_overlay.name: Overlay

temperature.description: Temperature to set climate entity to.
temperature.name: Temperature

time_period.description: Choose this or 'Overlay'. Set the time period for the change if you want to be specific.
time_period.name: Time period

set_climate_timer.name: Set climate timer

set_water_heater_timer.description: Turns on water heater for a set time.

time_period.description: Set the time period for the boost.
time_period.name: Time period

set_water_heater_timer.name: Set water heater timer
